name: Metal Drift
description: Metal Drift is a vehicular sport combat game set in a distant future. As the player, you command an agile, high powered hover tank in a futuristic sports arena. Core game play centers on intense tank-on-tank multiplayer team combat seen through an immersive, first person cockpit.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsProcessor: 1.8 GHzMemory: 1 GBGraphics: DirectX 9 128MB Video RamDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 250 MBSound: DirectX 9 Compatible
